item.description:
On Tuesday evening, Sep 16, at 6pm, we'll field trip to the Woburn faciliity of Azure Dynamics, a company that develops hybrid power systems for commercial vehicles.
We'll enjoy a presentation on Azure, and a factory tour, including labs and vehicles that are in the shop. (Visitors will have to sign a standard visitorâ€™s Non-Disclosure Agreement.)

Our host is Beat J. Arnet, Ph.D., Director of Hybrid Power Electronics. (His name is pronounced Bay-aht.)

Their website is at AzureDynamics.com.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the lobby. I'm 6' 4" tall and look like my picture.
item.name: Field Trip: Azure Dynamics Inc.
